text: Probably a re-post, but interesting reference <http://www.macworld.com/article/2893433/home-automation/pocket-vino-we-review-5-apps-for-managing-your-wine-cellar.html>

attachments.title: Pocket vino: We review 5 apps for managing your wine cellar
attachments.text: Assembling a collection of fine wines can take decades, but the best library holds little value if you don't know which volumes it contains.
attachments.fallback: Macworld: Pocket vino: We review 5 apps for managing your wine cellar

text: Thanks for sharing. I can follow-up with the contact, but he isn’t a reporter, more like a contributor. He owns his own business where companies pay his company to write blogs. Just wanted to share that context as typically contributors with their own business aren’t as interested in biz pitches. :slightly_smiling_face:
Or maybe add to the list for now
Just wanted to make sure you didn't miss it
